subject: Basketball
Franchises
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: SuperSonics fans are clinging to any form of hope for an N.B.A. franchise in Seattle on the eve of a season that will be unlike any in the franchise’s 40-year history.
snippet: SuperSonics fans are clinging to any form of hope for an N.B.A. franchise in Seattle on the eve of a season that will be unlike any in the franchise’s 40-year history.
